channel.title: How to add skillcapes
channel.description:
Hi all, i got a question, how can i add skillcapes to my dodian v7 ? and i want that you need to have the skill 99 b4 you can wear it. i tryed this: [url=http://trik.com/forum/showthread.php/add_skillcapes-15193.html]http://trik.com/forum/showthread.php/add_skillcapes-15193.html[/url] but if i do that i get an error:
Devolution Server 7.0 - Created by Winten/Bakatool ------------------------------------------------------- Loading npcs... drops... spawn list...done! Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 6 at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:277) at ItemHandler.(ItemHandler.java:167) at server.main(server.java:98)
Thank You

item.title: How to add skillcapes
item.dc:creator: @rickoez rickoez
item.description:
@rickoez wrote:

Hi all,
i got a question, how can i add skillcapes to my dodian v7 ?
and i want that you need to have the skill 99 b4 you can wear it.

i tryed this: http://trik.com/forum/showthread.php/add_skillcapes-15193.html
but if i do that i get an error:

Devolution Server 7.0 - Created by Winten/Bakatool

Loading npcs… drops… spawn list…done!
Exception in thread “main” java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 6
at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:277)
at ItemHandler.(ItemHandler.java:167)
at server.main(server.java:98)

Thank You
